name: AMERICAN ASSOCIATION OF PORT AUTHORITIES
sampleDescriptions: Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2019 (P.L. 116-20). FY20 House Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-94). FY20 Senate Energy and Water Development and Relat
